CdrDoc.CdrDocXml:
<?xml version = "1.0"?> <!-- ================================================================ $Id: CDR0000574726.xml,v 1.1 2007-10-29 15:13:21 venglisc Exp $
Filter to create the GlossaryTerm Name Title. Written by Volker Englisch, 2003-08-12
$Log: not supported by cvs2svn $ ================================================================ --> <xsl:transform xmlns:xsl = "http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" xmlns:cdr = "cips.nci.nih.gov/cdr" version = "1.0">
<xsl:output method = "text"/>
<!-- ================================================================= This filter creates the document.title for GlossaryTermName docs. ================================================================= --> <xsl:template match = "GlossaryTermName"> <xsl:apply-templates select = "TermName[@language ='en']/ TermNameString"/> </xsl:template> </xsl:transform>
